terms_required_text: You must accept the terms and conditions before paying.
payment_error_text: An error occurred on the server.
payment_rejected_text: The payment could not be processed.
payment_processed_text: Your payment has been processed successfully.
network_error_text: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again.
paypal_error_generic: The payment could not be processed.
coupon_invalid_code_text: The code you entered does not match any tour.
coupon_not_applicable_text: This coupon does not belong to any tour in your cart.
coupon_already_used_text: This coupon has already been applied.
coupon_validation_error_text: The coupon could not be validated at this time.
invalid_email: The email address format is invalid.
invalid_phone: The phone number must contain at least 8 digits.
field_min_value: The field "{field}" must be greater than or equal to {min}.
card_number_digits: The card number must contain between 13 and 19 digits.
card_month_invalid: The expiration month must be between 01 and 12.
card_year_invalid: The expiration year must have 2 digits.
card_maybe_expired: The card may be expired (check month and year).
cvv_digits: The CVV must be 3 or 4 digits.
checkout_before_checkin: The check-out date cannot be before the check-in date.
checkin_before_today: The check-in date cannot be before today.
checkout_before_today: The check-out date cannot be before today.
